messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE TO VOTERS LIVING IN THE HEXHAM CONSTITUENCY
messages.content: After the MP's expenses scandal, many people on the doorsteps have asked me: 'Does it make a difference who gets into power - aren't all politicians the same?' I'm writing to let you know that it will make a huge difference locally if Labour or the Conservatives are elected to govern Britain for the next 5 years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Because of Labour's investment in local public services, we will see a brand new hospital in Hexham, shorter hospital waiting times, more doctors and nurses - a new Sure Start children's centre in Prudhoe, Hexham, Bellingham, Haltwhistle and Ponteland - a road bypass around Haydon Bridge, making a huge improvement to local residents' quality of life - better pensions: the Winter Fuel Allowance, free bus pass for those over 60, and a free TV licence for those 75+.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Or years more neglect under the Conservatives
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Don't judge the Tories empty promises - judge them on their record - The Tories did nothing for this area, and starved our schools and hospitals of investment - Their recent law changes and pensions and -They increased the inheritance tax threshold to £1 million - a huge tax cut only for the wealthy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you want to prevent a Tory government but don't know how, a tactical vote for Labour is the right choice in this constituency - Labour has come 2nd in every election here since 1992, and is best placed to defeat the Tory candidate.

housing.content: a brand new hospital in Hexham, shorter hospital waiting times, more doctors and nurses - a new Sure Start children's centre in Prudhoe, Hexham, Bellingham, Haltwhistle and Ponteland

leaflet.personalStatement: I seek elected office for the honour of serving you, our local communities, and our democracy - communities working together

politicalExperience.achievements: Have raised personal issues of hundreds of constituents direct with government ministers and shadow ministers.

images.caption: Prudhoe Children's Centre - A SureStart Children's Centre.

leaflet.additionalNotes: If you value progress made here, and don't want to let the Tories back in, please post the enclosed postal vote or vote in person on 6th May. Thank you.
